title: John David Washington Gets an Education in ‘The Piano Lesson’
description: The actor adds to his body of knowledge with a starry production of the August Wilson play and a once-in-a-lifetime moment with Robert De Niro on “Amsterdam.”
dc:creator: Dave Itzkoff
media:credit: Tess Ayano for The New York Times
media:description: “I want to learn. I want to get beat up,” John David Washington said, explaining why he wanted to perform in “The Piano Lesson.”
